code_value: Questions 1~2   Your school is planning an opening ceremony for the coming sports meeting. Ask the event organizer two questions about the ceremony.</br>Questions 3~4  Your classmate, Jenny, has been admitted to a famous university in the UK. You want to further your study in UK too. Ask Jenny for advice.
Questions 1~2   Your school is planning an opening ceremony for the coming sports meeting. Ask the event organizer two questions about the ceremony.
Questions 3~4  Your classmate, Jenny, has been admitted to a famous university in the UK. You want to further your study in UK too. Ask Jenny for advice.
